summary: Completed comprehensive testing of AcmeSecure V2 website refinement. Backend APIs working perfectly (100% success rate). Frontend successfully implements V2 changes: 2-product strategy (Resilience & Aegis), new logos, updated contact info, and scroll-to-top functionality. Minor issues with form dropdown interactions and old product routes not returning 404s.

ui_bugs.issue: Role and Industry select dropdowns have visibility issues during automated testing - options not consistently clickable

design_issues.issue: Old product routes (/products/device-shield, /products/risk-intelligence, /products/compliance-audit, /products/threat-response) return 200 instead of 404

passed_tests: Backend API root endpoint (/api/) - 100% success rate
Demo request creation and validation with proper error handling
Contact form creation and data persistence
All data retrieval endpoints (demo-requests, contacts, status)
Home page loads with new hero text about well-being assessment and mobile security
AcmeSecure logo displays correctly from provided PNG file
Products section shows only 2 products: Resilience and Aegis with correct logos
Navigation dropdown shows only Resilience and Aegis (not old 4 products)
Resilience product page loads with well-being survey content
Aegis product page loads with mobile security enforcement content
Products comparison page shows 'Better Together' section
Solutions page shows 5 industries: IT/ITES, Large Enterprises, Government/PSU, BFSI, Education
Contact page shows new contact info: info@acmedian.com, +91-6283534979, Chandigarh and Noida India
Scroll to top works when navigating between pages
Footer links work correctly with Resilience and Aegis
All CTA buttons properly link to contact page
action_item_for_main_agent: 1) Fix form dropdown interactions for better UX - consider using force clicks or improving dropdown stability. 2) Configure old product routes to return proper 404 responses instead of 200. These are minor issues and don't affect core functionality.
